column4: i cannot fathom how anyone can possibly use or administer windows anymore
so its all somewhere on the learning curve i guess
and discovering the reason is usually a google away
go and figure out why anything in windows is the way it is
i don't think ms devs understand it
it requires a bit of skill in each one to setup right
i'm not sure this is the right place for that kind of support
we try to help people install a basic ubuntu system and keep it running
I have hoary hedgehog and it loaded my printer and it works fine why can't HP Deskjet work on Dapper Drake after it finds it and loads the driver it says :job:stopped
supported model? i would imagine i guess
hard to say, could be an issue with a driver
or and issue with the cups print server
that stuff is fairly easy to debug
you need to enable verbose logging for the cups server
if i new where to start
then you need to tail -f /var/log/somelogfile for cups to watch what the issue is
